content:
SecurityAlgorithmSuite Class

In this Article

Specifies properties of algorithms. This is an abstract class.

Syntax

Declaration

[System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter(typeof(System.ServiceModel.Configuration.SecurityAlgorithmSuiteConverter))]
public abstract class SecurityAlgorithmSuite

Inheritance Hierarchy

  • System.Object
  • SecurityAlgorithmSuite

Inherited Members

Equals(Object)
,
Equals(Object,Object)
,
GetHashCode()
,
GetType()
,
MemberwiseClone()
,
ReferenceEquals(Object,Object)
,
ToString()

Remarks

Instances of this class are used to specify the cryptographic characteristics of the algorithms used when securing messages.

This class is used by derived classes to instantiate security algorithm suites, and contains properties that describe the security algorithms. For example, the wsBasicHttp binding uses an internal derived class to specify the properties of its security algorithms.

Constructors summary

SecurityAlgorithmSuite()

Initializes a new instance of the SecurityAlgorithmSuite class.

Properties summary

Basic128

Gets the Basic128 algorithm suite.
Basic128Rsa15

Gets an algorithm suite that uses RSA15 as the key wrap algorithm and 128-bit Basic as the message encryption algorithm.
Basic128Sha256

Gets an algorithm suite that uses SHA256 for the signature digest and 128-bit Basic as the message encryption algorithm.
Basic128Sha256Rsa15

Gets an algorithm suite that uses RSA15 as the key wrap algorithm, SHA256 for the signature digest, and 128-bit Basic as the message encryption algorithm.
Basic192

Gets an algorithm suite that uses 192-bit Basic as the message encryption algorithm.
Basic192Rsa15

Gets an algorithm suite that uses RSA15 as the key wrap algorithm and 192-bit Basic as the message encryption algorithm.
Basic192Sha256

Gets an algorithm suite which uses SHA256 for the signature digest and 192-bit Basic as the message encryption algorithm.
Basic192Sha256Rsa15

Gets an algorithm suite that uses RSA15 as the key wrap algorithm, SHA256 for the signature digest, and 192-bit Basic as the message encryption algorithm.
Basic256

Gets an algorithm suite that uses 256-bit Basic as the message encryption algorithm.
Basic256Rsa15

Gets an algorithm suite that uses RSA15 as the key wrap algorithm and 256-bit Basic as the message encryption algorithm.
Basic256Sha256

Gets an algorithm suite that uses SHA256 for the signature digest and 256-bit Basic as the message encryption algorithm.
Basic256Sha256Rsa15

Gets an algorithm suite that uses RSA15 as the key wrap algorithm, SHA256 for the signature digest, and 256-bit Basic as the message encryption algorithm.
Default

Gets the default algorithm suite.
DefaultAsymmetricKeyWrapAlgorithm

Gets the default asymmetric key wrap algorithm as a string.
DefaultAsymmetricSignatureAlgorithm

Gets the default asymmetric signature algorithm as a string.
DefaultCanonicalizationAlgorithm

Gets the default canonicalization algorithm as a string.
DefaultDigestAlgorithm

Gets the default digest algorithm as a string.
DefaultEncryptionAlgorithm

Gets the default encryption algorithm as a string.
DefaultEncryptionKeyDerivationLength

Gets the default encryption key derivation length as an Int32 value.
DefaultSignatureKeyDerivationLength

Gets the default signature key derivation length as an Int32 value.
DefaultSymmetricKeyLength

Gets the default symmetric key length as an Int32 value.
DefaultSymmetricKeyWrapAlgorithm

Gets the default symmetric key wrap algorithm as a string.
DefaultSymmetricSignatureAlgorithm

Gets the default symmetric signature algorithm as a string.
TripleDes

Gets the Triple Data Encryption Standard (DES) algorithm suite.
TripleDesRsa15

Gets an algorithm suite that uses RSA15 as the key wrap algorithm and 192-bit Triple Data Encryption Standard (DES) as the message encryption algorithm.
TripleDesSha256

Gets an algorithm suite that uses SHA256 for the signature digest and 192-bit Triple Data Encryption Standard (DES) as the message encryption algorithm.
TripleDesSha256Rsa15

Gets an algorithm suite that uses RSA15 as the key wrap algorithm, SHA256 for the signature digest, and 192-bit Triple Data Encryption Standard (DES) as the message encryption algorithm.

Methods summary

IsAsymmetricKeyLengthSupported(Int32)

Indicates whether a particular key length is supported by the asymmetric algorithm.
IsAsymmetricKeyWrapAlgorithmSupported(String)

Indicates whether an asymmetric key wrap algorithm is supported.
IsAsymmetricSignatureAlgorithmSupported(String)

Indicates whether an asymmetric signature algorithm is supported.
IsCanonicalizationAlgorithmSupported(String)

Indicates whether a canonicalization algorithm is supported.
IsDigestAlgorithmSupported(String)

Indicates whether a digest algorithm is supported.
IsEncryptionAlgorithmSupported(String)

Indicates whether an encryption algorithm is supported.
IsEncryptionKeyDerivationAlgorithmSupported(String)

Indicates whether an encryption key derivation algorithm is supported.
IsSignatureKeyDerivationAlgorithmSupported(String)

Indicates whether a signature key derivation algorithm is supported.
IsSymmetricKeyLengthSupported(Int32)

When overridden in a derived class, indicates whether a particular symmetric key length is supported.
IsSymmetricKeyWrapAlgorithmSupported(String)

Indicates whether a symmetric key wrap algorithm is supported.
IsSymmetricSignatureAlgorithmSupported(String)

Indicates whether a symmetric signature algorithm is supported.

Constructors

  • SecurityAlgorithmSuite()

    Initializes a new instance of the SecurityAlgorithmSuite class.

    protected SecurityAlgorithmSuite ();

    Remarks

    The instances of this class consist of static properties and read-only properties, so the constructor does not initialize any properties.

Properties

  • Basic128

    Gets the Basic128 algorithm suite.

    public static System.ServiceModel.Security.SecurityAlgorithmSuite Basic128 { get; }

    Property Value

    • SecurityAlgorithmSuite

      The 128-bit Basic SecurityAlgorithmSuite.

    Remarks

    By default, AES-128 is used as the encryption algorithm.

  • Basic128Rsa15

    Gets an algorithm suite that uses RSA15 as the key wrap algorithm and 128-bit Basic as the message encryption algorithm.

    public static System.ServiceModel.Security.SecurityAlgorithmSuite Basic128Rsa15 { get; }

    Property Value

    • SecurityAlgorithmSuite

      An algorithm suite that uses RSA15 as the key wrap algorithm and 128-bit Basic as the message encryption algorithm.

    Remarks

    The SecurityAlgorithmSuite returned is actually an internal subclass that overrides some of the properties specifying default values as well as some of the methods.

  • Basic128Sha256

    Gets an algorithm suite that uses SHA256 for the signature digest and 128-bit Basic as the message encryption algorithm.

    public static System.ServiceModel.Security.SecurityAlgorithmSuite Basic128Sha256 { get; }

    Property Value

    • SecurityAlgorithmSuite

      An algorithm suite that uses SHA256 for the signature digest and 128-bit Basic as the message encryption algorithm.

    Remarks

    The SecurityAlgorithmSuite returned is actually an internal subclass that overrides some of the properties specifying default values as well as some of the methods.

  • Basic128Sha256Rsa15

    Gets an algorithm suite that uses RSA15 as the key wrap algorithm, SHA256 for the signature digest, and 128-bit Basic as the message encryption algorithm.

    public static System.ServiceModel.Security.SecurityAlgorithmSuite Basic128Sha256Rsa15 { get; }

    Property Value

    • SecurityAlgorithmSuite

      An algorithm suite that uses RSA15 as the key wrap algorithm, SHA256 for the signature digest, and 128-bit Basic as the message encryption algorithm.

    Remarks

    The SecurityAlgorithmSuite returned is actually an internal subclass that overrides some of the properties specifying default values as well as some of the methods.

  • Basic192

    Gets an algorithm suite that uses 192-bit Basic as the message encryption algorithm.

    public static System.ServiceModel.Security.SecurityAlgorithmSuite Basic192 { get; }

    Property Value

    • SecurityAlgorithmSuite

      An algorithm suite that uses 192-bit Basic as the message encryption algorithm.

    Remarks

    By default, AES-192 is used as the encryption algorithm.

  • Basic192Rsa15

    Gets an algorithm suite that uses RSA15 as the key wrap algorithm and 192-bit Basic as the message encryption algorithm.

    public static System.ServiceModel.Security.SecurityAlgorithmSuite Basic192Rsa15 { get; }

    Property Value

    • SecurityAlgorithmSuite

      An algorithm suite that uses RSA15 as the key wrap algorithm and 192-bit Basic as the message encryption algorithm.

    Remarks

    The SecurityAlgorithmSuite returned is actually an internal subclass that overrides some of the properties specifying default values as well as some of the methods.

  • Basic192Sha256

    Gets an algorithm suite which uses SHA256 for the signature digest and 192-bit Basic as the message encryption algorithm.

    public static System.ServiceModel.Security.SecurityAlgorithmSuite Basic192Sha256 { get; }

    Property Value

    • SecurityAlgorithmSuite

      An algorithm suite which uses SHA256 for the signature digest and 192-bit Basic as the message encryption algorithm.

    Remarks

    The SecurityAlgorithmSuite returned is actually an internal subclass that overrides some of the properties specifying default values as well as some of the methods.

  • Basic192Sha256Rsa15

    Gets an algorithm suite that uses RSA15 as the key wrap algorithm, SHA256 for the signature digest, and 192-bit Basic as the message encryption algorithm.

    public static System.ServiceModel.Security.SecurityAlgorithmSuite Basic192Sha256Rsa15 { get; }

    Property Value

    • SecurityAlgorithmSuite

      An algorithm suite that uses RSA15 as the key wrap algorithm, SHA256 for the signature digest, and 192-bit Basic as the message encryption algorithm.

    Remarks

    The SecurityAlgorithmSuite returned is actually an internal subclass that overrides some of the properties specifying default values as well as some of the methods.

  • Basic256

    Gets an algorithm suite that uses 256-bit Basic as the message encryption algorithm.

    public static System.ServiceModel.Security.SecurityAlgorithmSuite Basic256 { get; }

    Property Value

    • SecurityAlgorithmSuite

      An algorithm suite that uses 256-bit Basic as the message encryption algorithm.

    Remarks

    By default, AES-256 is used for the encryption algorithm.

    Example

    The following code shows how to set AlgorithmSuite to this property. 

                Dim binding As New WSHttpBinding()
            binding.Security.Mode = SecurityMode.Message
            binding.Security.Message.AlgorithmSuite = _
            System.ServiceModel.Security.SecurityAlgorithmSuite.Basic256

                    WSHttpBinding binding = new WSHttpBinding();
                binding.Security.Mode = SecurityMode.Message;
                binding.Security.Message.AlgorithmSuite =
                    System.ServiceModel.Security.SecurityAlgorithmSuite.Basic256;

    Gets an algorithm suite that uses RSA15 as the key wrap algorithm and 256-bit Basic as the message encryption algorithm.

    public static System.ServiceModel.Security.SecurityAlgorithmSuite Basic256Rsa15 { get; }

    Property Value

    • SecurityAlgorithmSuite

      An algorithm suite that uses RSA15 as the key wrap algorithm and 256-bit Basic as the message encryption algorithm.

    Remarks

    The SecurityAlgorithmSuite returned is actually an internal subclass that overrides some of the properties specifying default values as well as some of the methods.

    Remarks

    The SecurityAlgorithmSuite returned is actually an internal subclass that overrides some of the properties specifying default values as well as some of the methods.

  • Default

    Gets the default algorithm suite.

    public static System.ServiceModel.Security.SecurityAlgorithmSuite Default { get; }

    Property Value

    • SecurityAlgorithmSuite

      The default SecurityAlgorithmSuite is stem.ServiceModel.Security.SecurityAlgorithmSuite.Basic256*, which specifies 256-bit Advanced Encryption Standard (AES) as the symmetric encryption algorithm.

    Remarks

    The SecurityAlgorithmSuite returned is actually an internal subclass that overrides the properties specifying default values as well as the methods.

  • DefaultAsymmetricKeyWrapAlgorithm

    Gets the default asymmetric key wrap algorithm as a string.

    public abstract string DefaultAsymmetricKeyWrapAlgorithm { get; }

    Property Value

    • String

      The default asymmetric key wrap algorithm.

    Remarks

    When overridden, provides a string value that will be used for comparison in the IsAsymmetricKeyWrapAlgorithmSupported method.

  • DefaultAsymmetricSignatureAlgorithm

    Gets the default asymmetric signature algorithm as a string.

    public abstract string DefaultAsymmetricSignatureAlgorithm { get; }

    Property Value

    • String

      The default asymmetric signature algorithm.

    Remarks

    When overridden, provides a string value that will be used for comparison in the IsAsymmetricSignatureAlgorithmSupported method.

  • DefaultCanonicalizationAlgorithm

    Gets the default canonicalization algorithm as a string.

    public abstract string DefaultCanonicalizationAlgorithm { get; }

    Property Value

    • String

      The default canonicalization algorithm.

    Remarks

    When overridden, provides a string value that will be used for comparison in the method IsCanonicalizationAlgorithmSupported.

  • DefaultDigestAlgorithm

    Gets the default digest algorithm as a string.

    public abstract string DefaultDigestAlgorithm { get; }

    Property Value

    • String

      The default digest algorithm.

    Remarks

    When overridden, provides a string value that will be used for comparison in the IsDigestAlgorithmSupported method.

  • DefaultEncryptionAlgorithm

    Gets the default encryption algorithm as a string.

    public abstract string DefaultEncryptionAlgorithm { get; }

    Property Value

    • String

      The default encryption algorithm.

    Remarks

    When overridden, provides a string value that will be used for comparison in the IsEncryptionAlgorithmSupported method.

  • DefaultEncryptionKeyDerivationLength

    Gets the default encryption key derivation length as an Int32 value.

    public abstract int DefaultEncryptionKeyDerivationLength { get; }

    Property Value

    • Int32

      The default encryption key derivation length.

    Remarks

    The returned value will vary depending on the subclass that implements it. For Basic256 encryption, it returns 256.

  • DefaultSignatureKeyDerivationLength

    Gets the default signature key derivation length as an Int32 value.

    public abstract int DefaultSignatureKeyDerivationLength { get; }

    Property Value

    • Int32

      The default signature key derivation length.

    Remarks

    The returned value will vary depending on the subclass that implements it. For Basic256 encryption, it returns 192.

  • DefaultSymmetricKeyLength

    Gets the default symmetric key length as an Int32 value.

    public abstract int DefaultSymmetricKeyLength { get; }

    Property Value

    • Int32

      The default symmetric key length.

    Remarks

    The returned value will vary depending on the subclass that implements it. For Basic256 encryption, it returns 256.

  • DefaultSymmetricKeyWrapAlgorithm

    Gets the default symmetric key wrap algorithm as a string.

    public abstract string DefaultSymmetricKeyWrapAlgorithm { get; }

    Property Value

    • String

      The default symmetric key wrap algorithm.

  • DefaultSymmetricSignatureAlgorithm

    Gets the default symmetric signature algorithm as a string.

    public abstract string DefaultSymmetricSignatureAlgorithm { get; }

    Property Value

    • String

      The default symmetric signature algorithm.

    Gets the Triple Data Encryption Standard (DES) algorithm suite.

    public static System.ServiceModel.Security.SecurityAlgorithmSuite TripleDes { get; }

    Property Value

    • SecurityAlgorithmSuite

      The Triple DES SecurityAlgorithmSuite.

    Remarks

    The SecurityAlgorithmSuite returned is actually an internal subclass that overrides some of the properties specifying default values as well as some of the methods.

  • TripleDesRsa15

    Gets an algorithm suite that uses RSA15 as the key wrap algorithm and 192-bit Triple Data Encryption Standard (DES) as the message encryption algorithm.

    public static System.ServiceModel.Security.SecurityAlgorithmSuite TripleDesRsa15 { get; }

    Property Value

    • SecurityAlgorithmSuite

      An algorithm suite that uses RSA15 as the key wrap algorithm and 192-bit Triple Data Encryption Standard (DES) as the message encryption algorithm.

    Gets an algorithm suite that uses SHA256 for the signature digest and 192-bit Triple Data Encryption Standard (DES) as the message encryption algorithm.

    public static System.ServiceModel.Security.SecurityAlgorithmSuite TripleDesSha256 { get; }

    Property Value

    • SecurityAlgorithmSuite

      An algorithm suite that uses SHA256 for the signature digest and 192-bit Triple Data Encryption Standard (DES) as the message encryption algorithm.

    Remarks

    The SecurityAlgorithmSuite returned is actually an internal subclass that overrides some of the properties specifying default values as well as some of the methods.

  • TripleDesSha256Rsa15

    Gets an algorithm suite that uses RSA15 as the key wrap algorithm, SHA256 for the signature digest, and 192-bit Triple Data Encryption Standard (DES) as the message encryption algorithm.

    public static System.ServiceModel.Security.SecurityAlgorithmSuite TripleDesSha256Rsa15 { get; }

    Property Value

    • SecurityAlgorithmSuite

      An algorithm suite that uses RSA15 as the key wrap algorithm, SHA256 for the signature digest, and 192-bit Triple Data Encryption Standard (DES) as the message encryption algorithm.

    Remarks

    The SecurityAlgorithmSuite returned is actually an internal subclass that overrides some of the properties specifying default values as well as some of the methods.

Methods

  • IsAsymmetricKeyLengthSupported(Int32)

    Indicates whether a particular key length is supported by the asymmetric algorithm.

    public abstract bool IsAsymmetricKeyLengthSupported (int length);

    Parameters

    • length
      Int32

      The key length to check.

    Returns

    • Boolean

      true if the key length is supported by the asymmetric algorithm; otherwise, false.

    Remarks

    Typical key lengths are 128, 192, and 256 bits.

  • IsAsymmetricKeyWrapAlgorithmSupported(String)

    Indicates whether an asymmetric key wrap algorithm is supported.

    public virtual bool IsAsymmetricKeyWrapAlgorithmSupported (string algorithm);

    Parameters

    • algorithm
      String

      The algorithm to check.

    Returns

    • Boolean

      true if the asymmetric key wrap algorithm is supported; otherwise, false.

    Remarks

    algorithm gets compared to the string returned from DefaultAsymmetricKeyWrapAlgorithm.

  • IsAsymmetricSignatureAlgorithmSupported(String)

    Indicates whether an asymmetric signature algorithm is supported.

    public virtual bool IsAsymmetricSignatureAlgorithmSupported (string algorithm);

    Parameters

    • algorithm
      String

      The algorithm name to check.

    Returns

    • Boolean

      true if the asymmetric signature algorithm is supported; otherwise, false.

    Remarks

    algorithm gets compared to the string returned from DefaultAsymmetricSignatureAlgorithm.

  • IsCanonicalizationAlgorithmSupported(String)

    Indicates whether a canonicalization algorithm is supported.

    public virtual bool IsCanonicalizationAlgorithmSupported (string algorithm);

    Parameters

    • algorithm
      String

      The algorithm name to check.

    Returns

    • Boolean

      true if the canonicalization algorithm is supported; otherwise, false.

    Remarks

    algorithm gets compared to the string returned from DefaultCanonicalizationAlgorithm.

  • IsDigestAlgorithmSupported(String)

    Indicates whether a digest algorithm is supported.

    public virtual bool IsDigestAlgorithmSupported (string algorithm);

    Parameters

    • algorithm
      String

      The algorithm name to check.

    Returns

    • Boolean

      true if the digest algorithm is supported; otherwise, false.

    Remarks

    algorithm gets compared to the string returned from DefaultDigestAlgorithm.

  • IsEncryptionAlgorithmSupported(String)

    Indicates whether an encryption algorithm is supported.

    public virtual bool IsEncryptionAlgorithmSupported (string algorithm);

    Parameters

    • algorithm
      String

      The algorithm name to check.

    Returns

    • Boolean

      true if the encryption algorithm is supported; otherwise, false.

    Remarks

    algorithm gets compared to the string returned from DefaultEncryptionAlgorithm.

  • IsEncryptionKeyDerivationAlgorithmSupported(String)

    Indicates whether an encryption key derivation algorithm is supported.

    public virtual bool IsEncryptionKeyDerivationAlgorithmSupported (string algorithm);

    Parameters

    • algorithm
      String

      The algorithm name to check.

    Returns

    • Boolean

      true if the encryption key derivation algorithm is supported; otherwise, false.

  • IsSignatureKeyDerivationAlgorithmSupported(String)

    Indicates whether a signature key derivation algorithm is supported.

    public virtual bool IsSignatureKeyDerivationAlgorithmSupported (string algorithm);

    Parameters

    • algorithm
      String

      The algorithm name to check.

    Returns

    • Boolean

      true if the signature key derivation algorithm is supported; otherwise, false.

  • IsSymmetricKeyLengthSupported(Int32)

    When overridden in a derived class, indicates whether a particular symmetric key length is supported.

    public abstract bool IsSymmetricKeyLengthSupported (int length);

    Parameters

    • length
      Int32

      The key length to check.

    Returns

    • Boolean

      true if the symmetric key length is supported; otherwise, false.

    Remarks

    The length is compared to a range of values depending on the subclass. For example, in the TripleDES subclass, this method verifies that length is between 192 and 256, inclusive.

  • IsSymmetricKeyWrapAlgorithmSupported(String)

    Indicates whether a symmetric key wrap algorithm is supported.

    public virtual bool IsSymmetricKeyWrapAlgorithmSupported (string algorithm);

    Parameters

    • algorithm
      String

      The algorithm name to check.

    Returns

    • Boolean

      true if the symmetric key wrap algorithm is supported; otherwise, false.

  • IsSymmetricSignatureAlgorithmSupported(String)

    Indicates whether a symmetric signature algorithm is supported.

    public virtual bool IsSymmetricSignatureAlgorithmSupported (string algorithm);

    Parameters

    • algorithm
      String

      The algorithm name to check.

    Returns

    • Boolean

      true if the symmetric signature algorithm is supported; otherwise, false.
